import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get inventory stock by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/inventory/inventories/{InventoryId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a single inventory stock record by its unique identifier.

**Note**: This API is marked as deprecated (v1.0). Returns the inventory stock entry including related InventoryItem and Location details when requested via the Fields parameter.

**Prerequisites**:
- **InventoryId**: Use [POST /api/v1.0/inventory/inventories](/docs/api/inventory/query-inventories) to search stock records and extract `InventoryId`.

**Response Includes**:
- Stock details: quantity, average cost, min/max thresholds
- Related `InventoryItem` (catalog item)
- `Location` where stock is held

**Related Endpoints**:
- Update: [POST /api/v1.0/inventory/inventories/\{InventoryId\}/update](/docs/api/inventory/update-inventory)

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"InventoryId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the inventory stock record.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
